duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain financial records, reports, and general ledger accounts.
Perform account reconciliations and assist with budget and close processes.
Conduct internal audits and maintain accounts payable and accounts receivable documentation.
Assist with monthly close processes and contribute to the development and review of annual operating budgets.
Achieve processing and reporting deadlines and ensure compliance with GAAP.
Assist the accounting manager as needed and respond to information requests by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting required, One to two years related accounting experience
